---
title: "Reformatting fit values for Clayton"
output: html_notebook
---

### extracted DRC fit values from Clayton
Too many significant digits.

```{r}
d <- read.csv("../data/FitCoefficientResultsTotal.csv", row.names=1)
head(d)
```

```{r}
d[,c("Hill.Coefficient","Minimum.Response","EC50","residuals","logEC50")] <- 
    apply(d[,c("Hill.Coefficient","Minimum.Response","EC50","residuals","logEC50")],
          c(1,2), 
          function(x) signif(x,3)        
          )

head(d)
```
